001package edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.entity;
002
003import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
004import androidx.room.ColumnInfo;
005import androidx.room.Entity;
006import androidx.room.PrimaryKey;
007import java.net.URI;
008import java.time.Instant;
009import java.util.LinkedList;
010import java.util.List;
011
012@Entity(
013    tableName = "alert",
014    indices = {}
015)
016public class Alert {
017
018  @PrimaryKey(autoGenerate = true)
019  @ColumnInfo(name = "alert_id")
020  private long id;
021
022  @ColumnInfo(name = "triggered", index = true)
023  private boolean triggered;
024
025  @ColumnInfo(name = "timestamp", index = true)
026  @NonNull
027  private Instant timestamp = Instant.now();
028
029  private String photoname;
030
031  /**
032   * This returns the id of an individual alert
033   * @return
034   */
035  public long getId() {
036    return id;
037  }
038
039  /**
040   * THis annotates an individual alert with a unique id
041   * @param id
042   */
043  public void setId(long id) {
044    this.id = id;
045  }
046
047  /**
048   * This returns a boolean value that show if a particular alert ended in being
049   * triggered by motion
050   * @return
051   */
052  public boolean isTriggered() {
053    return triggered;
054  }
055
056  /**
057   * This annotates an individual alert with a boolean value that represents if the
058   * alert ended in being triggered by motion.
059   * @param triggered
060   */
061  public void setTriggered(boolean triggered) {
062    this.triggered = triggered;
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * This returns the timestamp of when the alert was armed = NOTE this is not the time
067   * a motion event was captured
068   * @return
069   */
070  @NonNull
071  public Instant getTimestamp() {
072    return timestamp;
073  }
074
075  /**
076   * This annotates an individual alert with the time is was armed
077   * @param timestamp
078   */
079  public void setTimestamp(@NonNull Instant timestamp) {
080    this.timestamp = timestamp;
081  }
082
083  /**
084   * This returns the filename of a photo, if one was taken
085   * @return
086   */
087  public String getPhotoname() {
088    return photoname;
089  }
090
091  /**
092   * This annotates the alert with the filename of a photo that was taken
093   * @param photoname
094   */
095  public void setPhotoname(String photoname) {
096    this.photoname = photoname;
097  }
098}
